wikitext.*:
{{album | image = Mines of Moria (soundtrack).png | title=''The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria'' | type=Soundtrack | artist=
[[Chance Thomas]]
[[Stephen DiGregorio]] | released=[[17 November]], [[2008]] | recorded= | genre=instrumental | length=1:01:30 | language=English | label=[[Turbine]] }} '''''The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria''''' is the soundtrack to ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria]]''. The soundtrack was released as part of the special edition to the game. ==Contents== #The Hollin Gate ([[Chance Thomas]]) #A Journey in the Dark (Chance Thomas) #Drums in the Deep (Chance Thomas) #Khazad-dûm (Chance Thomas) #In the Darkness Bind Them ([[Stephen DiGregorio]]) #Mines of Mithril (Stephen DiGregorio) #The Golden Wood (Chance Thomas) #Archers of the Galadhrim (Chance Thomas) #They Are Coming... (Stephen DiGregorio) #Durin's Day (Stephen DiGregorio) #The Falls of Nimrodel (Chance Thomas) #Runes of Fire (Stephen DiGregorio) #We Cannot Get Out (Stephen DiGregorio) #The Black Pit (Stephen DiGregorio) #Flame of Udûn (Chance Thomas) #The Shadow Lies Upon His Tomb (Stephen DiGregorio) #Hour of Doom (Chance Thomas) ==Reviews== The sound track to Mines of Moria has received positive reviews. ''Original Sound Version'' stated that this soundtrack "is superior to the film score."{{webcite|author=Patrick Gann|articleurl=http://www.originalsoundversion.com/digging-for-musical-gems-mines-of-moria-music-review/|articlename=Digging For Musical Gems: Mines of Moria Music (Review)|dated=14 January 2009|website=Engadget|accessed=25 August 2020}} {{references}} {{lotro}} {{title|italics}} [[Category:The Lord of the Rings Online soundtracks|mines of Moria]]
